LGrafEU 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Title

    distrubution_by_percent.Rd

    Title

    distrubution_by_percent(output_obj, crops_matrix)

    Arguments

    output_obj

    A LGraf placement output object

    crops_matrix

    A crop matrix indexing each crop and its percentage in the landscape

    Value

    A LGraf output object with crops assigned

    Examples

    r<-terra::rast(matrix(1, nrow=50, ncol=50))
map<-establish_by_place_conquer(potential_space= r,
                                cell_size=1,
                                includsion_value = 1,
                                mean_field_size = 100,
                                sd_field_size = 25,
                                distribution = "norm",
                                mean_shape_index = 1,
                                sd_shape_index = 0.3,
                                percent = 75,
                                assign_farmers = TRUE,
                                assign_mode = 2,
                                mean_fields_per_farm = 3,
                                sd_fields_per_farm = 3)


crops_matrix <- data.frame(crop = c("Wheat", "Corn", "Soybean"),
                          percentage = c(0.4, 0.3, 0.3),
                          index = c(1,2,3))  # Desired percentages

outcome<-distrubution_by_percent(map,crops_matrix)

plot_by_crop(outcome)
